title: Font ID - Sagmeister close to Gotham
content:
Hello everybody.  
I just needed some help identifying a font. I saw it (badly antialiased in flash) in the website [www.sagmeister.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516104006/http:/www.sagmeister.com/ "www.sagmeister.com"). I think titles are set in Gotham, but the body copy has slight differences, that part away from gotham, giving it a little more rectangular angles.  
Can anyone help?  
Thanx.
author: seml

comments.content: I would have said Gotham for both but I might be wrong.
There are different weights knocking around, even for the copy (gray).

I think it's all different weights of Gotham.  
The italics are slanted pretty much which I would consider typical for Gotham.

So I presume it's just an effect of the anti-alias?  
Thanx guys ;)
